title: Cannot access the free champions Alistar/Tristana and Garen
body:
Hello, I have did all of the requirements to achieve these 3 champions but each one has failed to give me the champion and my support tickets have gone unanswered.

Tristana - Liked their facebook page and received the error message "Sorry, Tristana will be available shortly" or something along those lines.

Garen - I liked their twitter page, got the code but whenever I tried to redeem the code I got the message  "There was a problem fullfilling your store items, please try again. If this problem persists please contact us at support.riotgames.com."

Alistar - I subscribed to the youtube channel and was advised to open a support ticket regardless and expect an automated response in 5 minutes. My ticket is still open, 8-10 hours later.

What do I need to do?

replies.body:
No worries fam, you did everything correctly more than likely. It's just those pages don't seem to always work, I gotchu tho ^_^!

Make sure to refresh your client if you haven't and you should have those champs and skins now!
